org.kepler.provenance

Class XMLRecording

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.provenance.Recording
      • org.kepler.provenance.XMLRecording
  • Deprecated. 
    This no longer works. For XML output, use ProvRecording.

    @Deprecated
public class XMLRecording
extends Recording
    Provenance recording that outputs to an XML file.
    Author:
    Faraaz Sareshwala

      • regParameter

        public boolean regParameter(NamedObj parameter)
                     throws RecordingException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: Recording
        Register a parameter. A parameter can be anything stored in the MoML that does not have its own regNNN() method. This can be user-level parameters (e.g., Parameter, StringParameter, etc.) or internal to Kepler (e.g., _location, semanticType000, etc.). (A "parameter" corresponds to a property in the MoML).
        Overrides:
        regParameter in class Recording
        Returns:
        if true, register contents of parameter.
        Throws:
        RecordingException
